nodes.text: "The Dagger" was an unscalable rock spire on the planet Onderon's southern point. At the base of the Dagger stood a collection of villages called Dox Piter. A legendary conflict took place between the beast Wodnakki and the Royal Guard of Queen Lina after the former built a nest atop the spire.
The Dagger is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught in the codex entry 'The Dagger at Dox Piter.'
